snippet: For distressed municipalities, attempts to plug budget holes with one-time transactions are giving way to other approaches.
abstract: Many financially strapped cities and counties nationwide have been pushed over the edge by the recession and its lingering aftermath; attempts to plug budget holes of distressed municipalities with one-time transactions are giving way to other approaches, including receiverships, emergency declarations and even bankruptcy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL COOPER and MARY WILLIAMS WALSH

lead_paragraph: For distressed municipalities, attempts to plug budget holes with one-time transactions are giving way to other approaches.

headline.seo: Cities Swap Bold Strategies for a New Fiscal Era
headline.main: Distressed Cities Weigh Bold Tactics in a New Fiscal Era
headline.print_headline: Distressed Cities Weigh Bold Tactics In a New Fiscal Era
